snippet.title: The King Is Watching Gameplay Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Watch the new narrated gameplay trailer for The King is Watching, which debuted at the Convergence Games Showcase. In this rogue-lite kingdom builder, defend your castle against ever-challenging waves of enemies. Prioritise production and army training, and make your people prosper under your constant gaze!

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2753900

#convergenceshow #indiegame
